name: Obsidian
short_desc: Powerful note-taking app for connected thoughts
author: linuxserver
description: Obsidian is a powerful note-taking app that lets you create, link, and organize your notes on your device. Access hundreds of plugins and themes to customize your workflow. Store notes locally, access offline, and sync with end-to-end encryption. Run in a containerized desktop environment with full GUI access via web browser.

form_fields.label: Basic Auth Username
form_fields.hint: Username for HTTP Basic authentication (default: abc)

form_fields.label: Basic Auth Password
form_fields.hint: Password for HTTP Basic authentication (leave empty for no auth)
